name: Create Airtable records from Unbounce submissions and Clearbit
description: Every time a new form is submitted in Unbounce, Make will automatically use the email output from that form to look a person up on Clearbit. If a result is returned it will create a new record in Airtable. If no result is returned it will use the form outputs to create a record in Airtable. For the proper work of this scenario you can use our [example table](https://airtable.com/shrMGNcYLZQTHavkj).
